name: Sealords
description:
Sealords

Submission for the Godot Wild Jam of January 2022. Game is buggy and imprecise due to us learning how to use the engine at the same time.

Basic Controls
  • Left Click - Select one unit and display their information
  • Left Click (dragged) - Select all units in an area
  • Right Click - Set target position for all selected allied units
  • Spacebar - Stop movement of all selected allied units
Advanced Controls
  • Shift+Right Click - Set a future target for all selected allied units
  • Ctrl+A - Select ALL units
  • Ctrl+E - Select all enemy units
  • Ctrl+R - Select all allied units
Boat attributes
  • Top left : Health Points
  • Top center : Attack damage per hit
  • Top right : Attack Speed (number of attacks per second)
  • Bottom left : Speed (relative to other boats, slowest point left, fastest points right)
  • Bottom middle : Range (more rings = hits farther)
  • Bottom right : Number of targets (shoots the closest # boats at range per hit)
Wrong Timeline is :

Art & Music - https://www.youtube.com/c/StanDusk

Programming & Game Design - https://twitter.com/nuclehon
